alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Greene (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 25 at 9:56AM EDT until September 25 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GREENE...SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE...MONONGALIA... NORTHWESTERN PRESTON AND CENTRAL MARION COUNTIES... At 956 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fairview, or 12 miles northeast of Mannington, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Morgantown, Fairmont, Westover, Mannington, Star City, Pleasant Valley, Winfield, Barrackville, Point Marion, Granville, Fairview, and Brookhaven. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
